title: Bug 121687: Exception thrown when exporting data from table inside a grid cell
description: When attempting to export data from a table that is located within a grid cell, an exception is thrown. No additional details are provided.
OB: The export of data from tables located within grid cells should complete without any exceptions being thrown.
EB: An exception is thrown when attempting to export data from tables that are located within grid cells. Specifically, the exception occurs in the ReportEngineService.getMetaData() function.
SR: Investigate the cause of the exception and ensure that data can be successfully exported from tables located within grid cells without any exceptions being thrown.
